content:
For inductive type T, what is the difference between T.rec and T.recOn?

The two look almost identical.

It's just a convenience definition, recOn is nicer to work with in some cases because the major premise comes before the minors. (see https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/270676-lean4/topic/type.20mismatch.20error/near/225229740)
Asei Inoue has marked this topic as resolved.
